alert.note: Alert for Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Richland and southeastern Sargent Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cayuga to near Geneseo to near Hankinson. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hankinson, Lidgerwood, Rutland, Mantador, Great Bend, Geneseo and Cayuga. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
